about_the_game:
Version

Aver.AAA08022025AAA. (a08-02-2025a Ver.)

About this game

This is a simple semi-nsfw themed JRPG. This JRPG is created using RPG Maker MZ. This JRPG is very short and can be completed in less than 30 minutes, emphasizing the story element of saving several kingdoms. The player is given an unlimited power, money and inventory. All of that, so the players can only enjoy the story elements in it. intended for casual gamers. Note 1: All main characters age are over 18. Note 2: Some princesses or heroines character design are inspired from princess Solange (Code of Princess) with quite a lot of modification. Note 3: Animeahikoaprinceaverses are Akihiko Prince's intellectual property. Part of Japan/Nihon's art and culture and part of Japan/Nihon and Indonesia's product. Akihiko Prince is a paternal grandson of Colonel (Purn.) Prince (Raden) A.S.Son.S. The protagonist, A Micro Prince Aoi Adisony Akitsushimahiko is a self-insert character of Akihiko Prince.

Story

A Micro Prince Aoi Adisony Akitsushimahiko, the prince from modern kingdom Ajapanadam alongside with his wife, A Micro Princess Akorea-Aca from modern kingdom Akoreaeve got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, A Micro Prince Aoi Adisony Akitsushimahiko and A Micro Princess Akorea-Aca decided to save all princesses.

Features

RPG battle turn based

Adventure up to 6 kingdom (each kingdom have 1 town & 1 castle with the interior and NPC. only items shop and weapon shop all pruchases able for player)

Casual (Easy Mode, only focus on story)

content_descriptors.notes: Prince Anihonhiko (prrotagonist) is a pantsu wearing cape prince, and other 7 princesses is a bikini armor wearing cape princess.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10(32)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: A Prince Aoi, the prince from modern kingdom Ajapanadam alongside with his wife, A Princess Akorea-Aca from modern kingdom Akoreaeve got isekaid into medieval isekai world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, Prince and Princess decided to save all princesses. A08022025A.
